name: Andar_Sizzton
content: Andar Sizzton was a male Human bounty hunter active during the Galactic Civil War. He operated with the team of hunters led by Zinn Classet, who were contracted to track down a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives for the Spice Mines of Kessel for freeing one of their slaves, the Wookiee Kentara. Sizzton tracked the group as the traveled aboard the Trax Express from Draenell's Point to Entrus.
